Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bac7(5-35) (Synthetic AMPs, fragment of Bac7, Arg-rich, Pro-rich; PrAMPs, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (88.57%) toBac7(1-35)P: 38%; R: 50%. GRAVY: -2.33; M Wt: 2076.541; Mol formula: C90H162N40O17; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 or ML-35 (MIC 16-32 uM), S-enterica Ser. Typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC >64 uM), S. marcescens ATCC8100 (MIC 32 uM), S.aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC >128 uM).SAR: Without the N-terminal 4 residues, peptide activity reduced substatntially.
Literature Information.Author: Benincasa M, Scocchi M, Podda E, Skerlavaj B, Dolzani L, Gennaro R. 2004
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity of Bac7 fragments against drug-resistant clinical isolates
